ðŸ“– Summary: kmp3 is a command-line music player written in C++. It supports a wide range of audio and video formats, displays cover images, and offers MPRIS D-Bus controls for external control. The player features customizable keybindings, playback speed adjustment, and mouse support for an enhanced user experience.
